name: Kuldea
slogan: Search, discover and shop furniture and home furnishing across the market
description:
Kuldea is the destination website for home furnishings that allows you to search an incredible choice of furniture products from hundreds of quality retail partners, covering all budgets and tastes, all in one place. 

Kuldea is reinventing the way furniture is searched, discovered, compared and shopped online.

team.title: Head of Marketing
team.name: Alexandra Warren
team.bioHtml: Worked at Eve Sleep as Head of Above the Line Marketing, and Photobox as Head of Brand Creative. Passionate about growing great brands.

jobs.title: PR and Content manager
jobs.description:
Kuldea are looking for a PR and content manager to join their rapidly growing business and accelerate the growth of the brand in the B2C home furniture and furnishings market. Working directly with the Head of Marketing, you will take full responsibility for planning and implementation of day-to-day, consumer and corporate PR and influencer activity.  You will also run a content marketing program, devising innovative and exciting content ideas, which you will execute and monitor to grow Kuldea reach. This role requires an understanding of the marketing landscape and an ability to produce creative content, as well as strategy development.

This is a really exciting, and key role in an early stage startup. The right candidate will have an amazing opportunity to shape the outward marketing strategy and take autonomous ownership for a key part of the business.
